dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Births on trains are, like, super rare medical emergencies that are impossible to handle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Births on trains are, like, super rare medical emergencies that are impossible to handle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company added that train crews regularly undergo training in first aid and emergency response. In the past three years, 15 babies have been born on trains operated by JSC "Passenger Transportation."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But that's actually not true at all. In fact, a baby girl was just born on the Astana to Zhezkazgan train, number 66, on May 27th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that's actually not true at all. In fact, a baby girl was just born on the Astana to Zhezkazgan train, number sixty six, on May twenty seventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A baby girl was born aboard the Astana"Zhezkazgan passenger train. According to the press service of JSC "Passenger Transportation," the birth took place on May 27 aboard train No. 66 en route from Astana to Zhezkazgan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, right there on the moving train? That's incredible. What happened?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, right there on the moving train? That's incredible. What happened?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the passenger, Alvina Pernabaeva, she went into labor during the trip. The train staff, uh, Chief Kiikbay Makhanov and conductor Altynai Gafiullina, they jumped into action immediately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the passenger, Alvina Pernabaeva, she went into labor during the trip. The train staff, uh, Chief Kiikbay Makhanov and conductor Altynai Gafiullina, they jumped into action immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The passenger, Alvina Pernabaeva, who was in the final month of pregnancy, went into labor during the trip and sought assistance from the train staff. Train chief Kiikbay Makhanov and conductor Altynai Gafiullina responded quickly and followed all protocol, organizing the conditions necessary for delivering the baby on board," the company said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Thank goodness they had some training for that sort of thing. Were they alone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thank goodness they had some training for that sort of thing. Were they alone?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, no. They were helped by two other passengersâ€”a paramedic and a kindergarten worker who were also on board. It was a real team effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, no. They were helped by two other passengers-a paramedic and a kindergarten worker who were also on board. It was a real team effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They were assisted by two fellow passengers " a paramedic from Satpayev and a kindergarten worker, the company added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's so heartwarming. And the baby was born healthy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's so heartwarming. And the baby was born healthy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, a healthy girl at 6:20 in the morning. They even had a medical team meet them at the next station, Zhenis, for follow-up care.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, a healthy girl at six twenty in the morning. They even had a medical team meet them at the next station, Zhenis, for follow-up care.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thanks to the efforts of the train staff and passengers, a healthy baby girl was delivered at 6:20 a.m. "A medical team was called to the nearest station, Zhenis, to meet the mother and newborn for further observation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And did they give the baby a name?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And did they give the baby a name?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They did! The father, Alikhan Zhanalin, said they named her Asylym. He was, um, super grateful to everyone who helped.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did! The father, Alikhan Zhanalin, said they named her Asylym. He was, um, super grateful to everyone who helped.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The baby's father, Alikhan Zhanalin, expressed sincere gratitude to everyone who stepped in and provided timely and professional help. He also said the girl was named Asylym," the press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's amazing this isn't even that unusual for them. The company said fifteen babies have been born on their trains in just the past three years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's amazing this isn't even that unusual for them. The company said fifteen babies have been born on their trains in just the past three years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the past three years, 15 babies have been born on trains operated by JSC "Passenger Transportation."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Their crews get regular first aid training for exactly these kinds of situations. It really paid off.
